context.p: You can move a single item with all its content to another location from the ContentMap without selecting the item.
To drag&drop an item from the ContentMap, do the following

info.p: Click the item in the ContentMap.

fig.title: Cursor on the element in the ContentMap.

step.cmd: Drag the item to the desired place.

info.p: Drag the item and drop it at the desired place in the ContentMap or the Editing Window.

fig.title: The element has been moved to another location.
